title: Goddess Arts Collection Handmade Decorative Battery Operated Flickering Flameless Pillar Candle with Timer Hand Painted Yellow Sunflower Design Boho Decor
features: LED Short Pillar Candle features flickering flame
description: Add flickering light to your Boho decor with this flameless pillar candle that features a gorgeous hand-painted yellow sunflower surrounded by golden-green leaves! And no worries about an open flame, as the pretty sunflower is lit from within the realistic wax-coated candle by a battery-operated flame...there's even a timer option! What a unique and artful addition to your Bohemian home! Real Wax-Coated Flameless Pillar Candle, 3" high, 3" wide...comes with 2 "AA" batteries, ready to light! **Your candle arrives to you in a gift bag with a pretty bow!** **FAST FREE US/REDUCED INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING**
details: {"Package Dimensions": "4.61 x 4.57 x 3.23 inches; 6.98 Ounces", "Date First Available": "June 18, 2020"}
